title: Add Otter Framework to an Angular project
description: ngAdd Otter Framework to the Angular project

preset.description: Preset of module list to automatically install

x-prompt.message: Which preset to use to start your application?

items.label: BASIC - Minimum plugin list to install for a basic Otter application. (details on https://www.npmjs.com/package/@o3r/core#preset-basic)
CMS - Add the Otter modules allowing the full administration of the application via the CMS. (details on https://www.npmjs.com/package/@o3r/core#preset-cms)

enableCustomization.x-prompt: Add Otter customization mechanism to allow presenter and injectable override by external custom application

enableAnalytics.x-prompt: Activate Otter Analytics to gather and report analytics to specific providers (such as Google Analytics, Adobe Target, ...)?

enableStyling.description: Install Otter theming and styling extractor
enableStyling.x-prompt: Add Otter theming and styling mechanism, it will require the setup of @angular/material package (included in CMS package)?

enableConfiguration.description: Install otter configuration package and config extractor setup
enableConfiguration.x-prompt: Add Otter configuration to support application and component runtime configuration (included in CMS package)?

enableRulesEngine.x-prompt: Add Otter rules-engine to execute runtime custom rules defined in an external json file (see https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/otter/tree/main/docs/rules-engine)?

enableLocalization.description: Localization generation setup and localization extractor
enableLocalization.x-prompt: Add Otter localization module allowing to configure translations via a JSON file loaded by the application at runtime (included in CMS package)?

enableApisManager.x-prompt: Add APIs manager mechanism providing a way to manage the application SDKs via injectable?

generateAzurePipeline.description: Generate the Azure Pipeline for the new project
generateAzurePipeline.x-prompt: Generate basic Azure Pipelines for your application CICD (deprecated)?

commit.description: Initial git repository commit information. (Available at workspace setup only)

skipGit.description: Do not initialize a git repository. (Available at workspace setup only)
